Ref: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the IAM role and ACM certificate association.

GetAtt.Description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket to which the certificate was uploaded.
The Amazon S3 object key where the certificate, certificate chain, and encrypted private  key bundle are stored. The object key is formatted as follows: role_arn/certificate_arn.
The ID of the AWS KMS key used to encrypt the private key of the  certificate.
